title: Police: 4 shot at Aurora house party
content:
AURORA, Colo. — Four people were shot at a large house party in Aurora late Saturday night.
Aurora Police say the call came at about 11:40 p.m. on a shooting in the 2300 block of Paris St.
Spokesman Sgt. Frank Fania says three juveniles were shot by a small caliber weapon and a bullet grazed a 4th person.
All four people were expected to recover from their injuries.
No arrests had been made in the case.
